sentences.english: She was too slight to play basketball.
sentences.chinese: 她太纖弱了，無法打籃球。

sentences.english: The old basketball star walks gingerly on aching knees.
sentences.chinese: 年邁的籃球明星會因膝蓋的傷痛步履蹣跚。

sentences.english: I was recruited to play intercollegiate basketball and became a professional player.
sentences.chinese: 開始打的是大學籃球，後來成爲了一名職業球員。

sentences.english: After we greeted, we went to play basketball in Liwan Gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 在我們迎接，我們去荔灣體育館打籃球。

sentences.english: Yao is the icon of China's basketball.
sentences.chinese: 姚明是中國籃球的代表人物。

sentences.english: In the basketball match he can block.
The basketball fans call him flying man in China.
sentences.chinese: 他的籃球粉絲們都叫他“中國飛人”。

sentences.english: Yes. We just had a basketball match with Class Two.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我們剛跟二班進行了籃球比賽。

sentences.english: We elected her captain of our basketball team.
sentences.chinese: 我們選她當籃球隊隊長。

sentences.english: The basketball player is really tall.
sentences.chinese: 這位籃球隊員真是很高。

sentences.english: Ron Artest likes basketball because he gets to shoot around.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰喜歡籃球由於他喜歡隨便射的感覺。

sentences.english: We can't play basketball today, but we can play hide-and-seek instead.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們不能打籃球了，但是我們可以改玩捉迷藏。

sentences.english: Your article looks great! Thanks for you sharing. I love it.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章是非常受歡迎的，喜愛籃球的人越來越多。

sentences.english: He refereed a basketball game yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天爲一場籃球賽作裁判。

sentences.english: Defence has always been weak and vulnerable in the basket-ball matches in China.
sentences.chinese: 防守是我國籃球隊的一個薄弱環節。

sentences.english: Hongkong Winling has dominated Hongkong basketball league for many years.
sentences.chinese: 多年來，永倫隊在香港籃球聯賽中一直是一枝獨秀。

definition: club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
(sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
